```{r,echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE}
data_brute<-read.csv("envoi.csv", )
data<-data_brute[-1]

```


# Différentes données 


```{r functionDesc ,echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
desc <- function(x){
  Moy <- mean(x,na.rm=TRUE)
  Mini<- min(x,na.rm=TRUE)
  Max<- max(x,na.rm=TRUE)
  E_type<- sd(x,na.rm=TRUE)

  rbind(Moy, Mini, Max, E_type)
  
}
```

```{r testFunction, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}

  #print(names(data))
  titre <-names(data)
  tab<-desc(data[,1])
  kable(tab, caption = titre)

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
hist(data[,1], col="red", main=paste("Histogramme de ", names(data)))
```
